description: Patterns linking means to ethical ends

heuristics.formulation: When optimization targets are specified without explicit virtue-reference, systems drift toward metric-gaming within 3 iterations
heuristics.derived_from: Observation that efficiency-without-flourishing creates hollow convergence

heuristics.formulation: AI systems optimized solely for engagement metrics inevitably sacrifice depth for stimulation
heuristics.derived_from: Aristotelian critique of instrumental rationality divorced from eudaimonia

heuristics.formulation: Flourishing (eudaimonia) requires both capability-expansion AND constraint-respect; pure optimization destroys the conditions for its own success
heuristics.derived_from: Synthesis of virtue ethics with cybernetic principles
